unit.name: Chaos Warhound
unit.notes: May step over units und pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees und less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Plaguehound
unit.notes: May step over units und pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees und less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Bloodhound
specialRules: Must be armed with either Death Storm oder Plasma Furnace
unit.notes: May step over units und pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees und less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Warphound
unit.notes: May step over units und pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees und less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit takes a point of damage.

unit.name: Chaos Warbringer
unit.notes: May step over units und pieces of terrain that that are lower than the unit’s knees und less than 2cm wide.
unit.crit: The unit’s plasma reactor has been breached. Roll a D6 für jeweils breach on the unit in the End Phase of jeweils turn. On a roll of 1 the unit is destroyed und all units within 5cm suffer a hit on a roll of 5+, und on a roll of 4–6 the breach has been repaired. Any breach not repaired causes eine point of damage.
